subject: RE: SSN5587
description_text:
Hi there,
could you please update me on the second part of the shipping? It's a
different courier and it looks like it still has to be picked up.

Best,
L

conversations.body_text: Hi Lorenzo Iovino,  Due to a temporary stock shortage of the VAM Pro, it will be shipped in the next few days. We sincerely apologize that, as a result, the tracking information has not been updated yet, and we appreciate your understanding and patience.Â
